casebody.data:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, AS TRUSTEE FOR SOUNDVIEW HOME LOAN TRUST 2006-OPT2, Asset-Backed Certificates, Series 2006-OPT2, Plaintiff,
v.
RICA ENTERPRISES, INC., et al., Defendants,
and
Sophia Costa, Defendant-Movant. M-616 September Term 2018
080666 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 8, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order denying certification is denied.
